caption:
“Hope leaves footprints.”

Reflection:
Every step taken in trust shapes the path for others to follow. Hope travels farther than we imagine.

Commentary:
This line teaches that faith inspires more than we see. The traces of courage we leave behind become road signs for weary souls.
